item.title: Webinar Went Well
item.description: Feel good today as the webinar that I as working on for many days went really well. Feeling happy. http://www.ravisagar.in/notes/few-spots-left-i-am-doing-webinar-devops-using-atlassian-toolset-28th-march-2018-3-pm-gmt
